title: Baby Journal
description: The ultimate web app designed for mothers to document their baby's activities, milestones, and precious moments.
myRole: Sole designer and developer from conceptualization to execution. This Next.js app combines Next-Auth for authentication, Next-Intl for internationalization, and MongoDB as its database

title: Candy Catz
description: Official web store of the Candy Catz fashion clothing manufacturer
myRole: I played a key role as the exclusive developer responsible for the recent renovation of the store's appearance. I worked closely with the client to ensure that the new design aligned perfectly with their vision and brand identity. The website now boasts the full functionality of a Shopify store, tailored to appeal to a US demographic fascinated by rave culture. Engaging in this project was exciting, and the end result has brought immense satisfaction to myself and the client.

title: Rave Kitty
description: Official web store of the Rave Kitty fashion clothing manufacturer
myRole: The emergence of the Rave Kitty brand presented an intriguing challenge, which needed to be elevated it to its full potential. The brand caters to a US demographic passionate about the rave culture. I handled all development tasks for the now fully operational Shopify store, which will eventually be populated with hundreds of fashion products. I am truly proud of the professional achievement reflected in the final outcome.

title: Stitch Sense
description: Official web site of the Stitch Sense clothing manufacturer
myRole: I was in charge of every aspect from the initial conceptualization to the execution of this project. The website has been designed to effectively showcase the company's services and portfolio. This was a very fulfilling project with ample creative freedom. Collaborating with the  client enhanced the process, which ensured that the final product truly reflected their vision and objectives.

title: Travel@Style
description: eCommerce platform for a New York based store focusing on travel apparel and hand-held steamer irons.
myRole: Sole designer and developer from conceptualization to execution. T@S is my first more complex extracurricular Bootstrap/JavaScript project. It took 2 months of sporadic work to finish it, but it was all worth it, because the client and myself were very happy with the final result.

notes.note: The shop's functionality was never fully implemented.

title: IvyLu - Art & Beauty
description: Official web app of the IvyLu beauty salon
myRole: Sole designer and developer from conceptualization to execution. The web app allows for users to register, order products, and schedule their beauty salon services online. The unique concept of the business is that, amongst other things, it gives rising artists the opportunity to display their work in the premises of the establishment and boost their popularity.

notes.note: The site's functionality has not been finalized

title: VX Aviation
description: Company site for a Tampa Bay area based personal flight training school.
myRole: Originally written in 2017 using vanilla technologies, the site has now been revamped with React. As the sole designer and developer, I managed the project from conceptualization to execution. Although the current new design does not deviate much from the original, it is more visually appealing and user-friendly. It is now a Single Page Application and is fully responsive, providing a seamless experience across all devices.

title: Brasileirão 2019
description: A fictional website on the topic of the "Brasileirão" 2019 Soccer Championship
myRole: Sole designer and developer from conceptualization to execution. The original web app had been written as a MPA in 2020 with Node and hbs, but now it has been rewritten and optimized as a SPA in React (with TypeScript). The functionality to change languages has been implemented using the i18next library. The project presents fast and visually pleasant results.

title: Ariel Behar Portfolio
myRole: Although my original site was created in 2017, this version has undergone a thorough make-over with React. I've also made use of Typescript, which has contributed to the creation of an easily manageable codebase. All related assets have also been optimized, which has has resulted in a more pleasant UX and boosted overall performance.

notes.note: The site you are currently visiting

title: A&M GameHub
description: A desktop based web application to assist my little sisters learn English, European geography and Hebrew.
myRole: I am the sole designer and developer of this project from conceptualization to execution. The functionality of the application is written in vanilla JavaScript with the exception of a few lines of jQuery. Overall, a very exciting project with gratifying results.

notes.note: Optimized for large screen sizes only.

title: Blago-darya
description: Voluntary initiative to help shelter homeless and wounded animals in Bulgaria. The organization gathers funds through direct donations and product sales.
myRole: Sole designer and developer. This is my biggest and most gratifying project to date. It is for a great cause and is being led by a passionate friend which will expand this initiative to become the leading one of its kind in the country.

title: eSports Marketing Group
description: Online marketing firm for eSports competitors. The site is a hub for people to receive representation, guorderance and marketing tools on a professional level.
myRole: Lead developer from conceptualization to execution. It was the first site I ever built with Wordpress and served me as an introduction to the CMS platform. It was an interesting concept to work on and I am very happy with the final result.

notes.note: The site is no longer live

title: T&T Customs
description: The site is a front for a business creating custom apparel for school sports teams in the Tampa Bay area.
myRole: Lead developer from conceptualization to execution. The site went through several modifications during the development process, since new and better creative tools were being provided, which were then implemented. The final result was rather pleasing.

notes.note: The site is no longer live

title: The Credit Score Guru
description: Credit repair site aiming to present viable options for people to fix their credit score and create positive purchasing habits in the future.
myRole: Lead developer from conceptualization to execution. This site was a rather enjoyable project for me to work on, because of the relative experience I had already gained working with Wordpress.

notes.note: The site is no longer live

title: HUG Tampa Bay
description: A Tampa based non-profit organization that strives to connect people with disabilities to social activities and events in the community
myRole: I worked on this project in the capacity of web designer for Visual Edge Design. I was tasked to redesign it and bring it up to date with the latest design trends of 2017. Additionally, I incorporated different functionalities and improved on the overall look and feel, while sticking to the original character of the site.

title: Body Wrap Spalon
description: An Oklahoma based Spa Services website. The site appeals mainly to women, but offers treatments also for men.
myRole: Redesign and face-lift of the overall look and feel of the website. I worked on this project in the capacity of web designer for Visual Edge Design. I was tasked to bring this site up to date, by applying design concepts that conform to the 2017 tendencies, while also keeping the already established character of the brand.

notes.note: The site is no longer live
